name: homegymdiy-site-generator
description: Generate a lightweight static site from README.md files for GitHub Pages

scripts.clean-site: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('./docs', { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('docs/ removed')"
scripts.dev: npm run clean-site && npm run build-site && npx http-server docs -p 8080 -c-1
